document.full_text: cuban defector leonys martin, a speedy outfielder, has signed a five-year contract with the texas rangers, the major league baseball team said on wednesday.
document.title: rangers sign cuban defector to $15 million deal
lines_and_colors: cuban defector leonys martin, a speedy outfielder, has signed a five-year contract with the texas rangers, the major league baseball team said on wednesday.
